thread.title: Shark bites surfer on Oahu's North Shore
thread.title_full: Shark bites surfer on Oahu's North Shore | News24

author: news24.com
title: Shark bites surfer on Oahu's North Shore
text:
Honolulu - A 25-year-old Oahu man has been bit by a shark while surfing on Oahu's North Shore.
Honolulu Department of Emergency Management spokesperson Shayne Enright said the attack happened near a popular surfing spot known as Leftovers, about 5 km away from the famed Banzai Pipeline.
Enright said an emergency call was received at 10:25 am and the victim was already on the beach when rescue crews arrived.
The man had an injury to his left leg and cuts on his hands. The man was hospitalised for treatment in critical condition.
